sentence: When House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy named the MAGA-friendly Reps. Jim Jordan and Jim Banks, two known bomb-throwers hostile to the committee, Pelosi exercised her veto power.
author: Eleanor Clift
title: The Jan. 6 Committee Members Are Patriots Making Sure Treason is Fully Documented

sentence: Democrats often cry foul on alleged Republican gerrymandering, but they are silent as they engage in similar conduct on a larger scale, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, said this week on "Life, Liberty & Levin."
title: Jim Jordan: Gerrymandering apparently only exists when GOP does it

sentence: Kevin McCarthy, the minority leader, frequently breaks with McConnell in his expressions of fealty, in part because his caucus includes “Make America great again” extremists such as Madison Cawthorn, Matt Gaetz, Ronny Jackson, Jim Jordan and Marjorie Taylor Greene.
author: David Smith
title: Renewed opposition to Trump stirs among establishment Republicans

sentence: He continues, "I promise: I'll join Ohio's own Jim Jordan and other true conservatives in the House Freedom Caucus to fight for what we believe."
title: Morning Digest: Maryland's Republican governor and Democratic legislature reach redistricting deal
